name: @agtm/nuxt-model
description: Classe para implementação de modelos de dado orientado a objeto

scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish
